column4: Hi, my samba is screwed and I need to add a network printer by hand in the following format: smb://[workgroup/]server[:port]/printer... anybody know what port windows printers are shared on? thanks
because [:port] is in [ ], it means its optional and you do not need to specify it.
odd, but thanks I'll give it a shot now. :)
THANK YOU! I've been screwing with samba for a week! thanks!
